item.title: This Autonomous Aquatic Robot Is Smaller Than a Grain of Salt
item.description: Researchers have succeeded in developing the smallest fully autonomous robot in history. It measures less than 1 millimeter and can swim underwater for months powered only by light.

item.title: Windows, Mac, Android, or iPhone: Save this keyboard cheat sheet now
item.description: No matter what type of device or operating system you’re using, this is the speed-typing guide you never knew you needed. If you’re an old-school writer like me, usually the words alone are all you need. But once in a while, you need something extra.

item.title: Don’t reply ‘STOP’ to unsolicited text messages. Do this instead
item.description: They tell you that replying “STOP” will get the texts to cease. But in many cases, they’re lying. And it can often make things worse. Here’s a better way to staunch the flow. Spammers and malicious actors inundate us with a steady stream of text messages—often purporting to be from legitimate institutions or companies. Stanching this flow isn’t easy. Just as the unwanted emails we receive often tell us that we can simply unsubscribe via the “unsubscribe” link, these text messages explain that we can opt out of future communication simply by replying “STOP.” But that’s not always a safe way to ...

item.title: 5 quick ways to make your iPhone act more like it used to, before Apple’s iOS 26 update
item.description: Get the old navigation bar back on Safari, stop songs from running together in the Music app, find your voicemails again, and more. Apple’s iOS 26 has been available for nearly six months now, but it’s still one of the company’s least well-received software updates for the iPhone.

item.title: Why everyone on TikTok is pretending to be an owl
item.description: Do you know what an owl would sound like as Keira Knightley? Now you do. Over the past couple of days, TikTok has been flooded with owl impressions—albeit ones in which the birds sound like various celebrities, have regional accents, or find themselves in hyper-specific situations.

item.title: Artemis 2 crew could be the first to ever lay eyes on these lunar areas
item.description: NASA’s Artemis 2 crew will do more than just fly past the moon — they will scan the mysterious far side with their own eyes for clues.

item.title: Neuroscience just discovered a weird way to tell when someone is really listening to you
item.description: Watching when people blink can help you tell whether you have their attention. Is there an easy way to tell when someone is really listening to what you say? New research just uncovered one unexpected sign: They may blink less. That’s the finding of a study by researchers at Concordia University in Montreal.

item.title: Meilleurs smartphones haut de gamme 2026 : nos recommandations et tests
item.description: Vous partez en quête du smartphone de vos rêves et vous avez un budget illimité pour vous l'offrir ? Bienvenue sur notre sélection de smartphones haut de gamme, tous testés et approuvés, pour vous aider dans votre choix.

item.title: Contraintes d’ouvrir le capot sur leurs données d’entraînement, OpenAI, Google et Mistral traînent des pieds
item.description: Plusieurs grandes entreprises spécialisées dans l’intelligence artificielle sont déjà censées fournir un résumé des données utilisées pour entraîner leurs modèles, en raison de l'AI Act. Mais aucun de ces géants n'a encore joué le jeu et « ouvert son capot ». Et pour cause : donner accès à ces données pourrait entraîner des paiements et des dédommagements à répétition, une situation que les géants de l'IA cherchent coûte que coûte à éviter....

item.title: A practical blueprint for scaling AI in financial services
item.description: Financial institutions must shift their focus if they want to see true value from AI.

item.title: Why everything you think about yourself could be an illusion
item.description: Neuroscience, physics, and Buddhism all agree: There is nothing fixed about us—not even close. Below, J. Eric Oliver shares five key insights from his new book, How To Know Your Self: The Art & Science of Discovering Who You Really Are.

item.title: Final Fantasy VII Remake Intergrade : la version Switch 2 est-elle au niveau ?
item.description: Attendue de longue date, la version Switch 2 de Final Fantasy VII Remake Intergrade est disponible depuis cette semaine en France. Mais que vaut vraiment ce portage et mérite-t-il qu’on se replonge une énième fois dans l’aventure ?
